conbody.p: This is an independent view which can display the execution flow across different subroutines. Starting with a supplied subroutine, hierarchy of calls made from this subroutine can be viewed by expanding the tree. On hovering over the name of the subroutine, the tooltip displays the line in which the actuall call is made. Subroutines can be opened from this view either by double-click or by selecting open upon right-click.
